    low: "bg-green-500",
    medium: "bg-yellow-500",
    high: "bg-violet-500",
    urgent: "bg-orange-500",
    critical: "bg-red-500",
  }
  return (
    <div
      className={cn(
        "size-2.25 shrink-0 rounded-full",
        colors[priority as keyof typeof colors]
      )}
    />
  )
}
